keywords: cook method.hob, oven, grill@hob / grill / oven
subtitle: Deliciously sweet, looks fantastic and easy to make.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Rinse the duck under cold running water. Pat dry with kitchen paper. Sprinkle half the five-spice seasoning into the cavity of the duck with the onion, carrot and garlic.
Mix the oil with the remaining spice powder and rub over the skin of the duck. Place in a roasting tin on a wire rack. Cook in oven for 1 hour 30 min.
Remove from oven. Strain off meat juices. Increase oven temperature to 220°C. Return to oven and cook for 20 min, or until skin is crispy.

title: Roast duck with nectarines
